catalog_info.title: Introductory Real Analysis
catalog_info.prereq: Anti-Req: Not to be taken in addition to Mathematics 23a,b or 25a,b or 55a,b.
catalog_info.description: An introduction to mathematical analysis and the theory behind calculus. An emphasis on learning to understand and construct proofs. Covers limits and continuity in metric spaces, uniform convergence and spaces of functions, the Riemann integral.
